epfl.sweng.editquestions

Class Answer

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.sweng.editquestions.Answer

  • public class Answer
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    CanGuzelhan This class represents an answer slot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Answer(java.lang.String check, java.lang.String answerText)
      Each answer the user types is represented by an Object of type Answer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Answer

        public Answer(java.lang.String check,
      java.lang.String answerText)
        Each answer the user types is represented by an Object of type Answer. The user can modify the text and choose whether this answer is the correct one or not.
        Parameters:
        check - The property of the answer: it might be marked as correct (✔) or incorrect (✘).
        answerText - The text of the answer that the user can enter.
